content: it over for extra thickness that is totally fine slip_stitch at the back of the collar to finish off weave in ends block if desired designer s note this pattern can be adapted for any right-angled triangle pattern that you like the best if you feel confident enough with your skills you can even halve your favorite square pattern on the diagonal to turn it into a right-angled triangle to adapt it for this pattern have fun oh and did the chart/instructions seem familiar it s the single chain spine variation of my beginner shawl it s fun when a little tweak to one pattern can come up with something new isn t it
